item.title: Gloves Dryer
item.description: Most days, I cycle to work, but I live in Ireland, and rain has become an inseparable part of the commute. While it is not a big issue as I carry spare clothes and shoes, my gloves and shoes do get wet and donâ€™t dry over the workday. To reduce the time it takes to dry, one can use a few tricks. In this case, I went with a bit of ventilation.
